nodes.text: Moonus Mandel was an astronomical object located in the Bothan Space sector, in the galaxy's Mid Rim. It was homeworld of the Veknoid podracer Teemto Pagalies.

Moonus Mandel was first mentioned in the Star Wars Legends novelization of Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace which was written by Terry Brooks and released in 1999. The world was confirmed to be canon by the reference book Ultimate Star Wars, which was released in 2015.
